module chargedesign_utilities

module containing set of utility functions used in the main script chargedesign.py

chargedesign_utilities.check_symmetry_file(pose_in, symm_file)

checks symmetry file symm_file: should be for Cn symmetry, with n being equal to the number of chains in pose_in

Parameters:

  • pose_in – pose to be tested

  • symm_file (str) – path to rosetta symmetry file

chargedesign_utilities.get_scores(pose, pdb_out, exclude_residues, scorefxn, kT_sampling)

calculates scores after chargedesign metropolis monte-carlo trial move has been performed.

Parameters:

  • pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – pose after the trial move, used to get sequence and rosetta_energy.

  • pdb_out (str) – path to which the pose will be saved before score calculation (needed for pqr2pdb/apbs calculations which start from pdb file)

  • exclude_residues (list of int) – list of pose residue indices (for asymmetric unit) for residues to be excluded from the calculation of averages of the electrostatic potential over the protein solvent acessible surface.

  • scorefxn (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.scoring.ScoreFunction) – pyrosetta scorefunction for calculating the rosetta_energy

  • kT_sampling (float) – instantaneous value of kT_sampling during simulated annealing, just stored and passed on.

chargedesign_utilities.save_scores(score_file, scores, pdb_out, n)

saves scores of chargedesign metropolis monte-carlo run to score_file.

Parameters:

  • score_file (str) – path to score_file

  • scores (dict) – dictionary with score information to be saved

  • pdb_out (str) – path to pdb_file to which output of the metropolis monte-carlo trial move (step n) was saved.

  • n (int) – step number of the metropolis monte-carlo run

chargedesign_utilities.find_neighbours(pose, target_residueset, distance_threshold)

find residueset of residues close to residues in a target_residueset given some distance_treshold. The target_residueset itself is excluded from the neighbour list.

Parameters:

  • pose (pyrosetta.rosetta.core.pose.Pose) – input pose

  • target_residueset (list of int) – residueset of residues close to which we are seeking other residues

  • distance_treshold (float) – distance_treshold in Angstrom

Returns:

residueset

Return type:

list of int

chargedesign_utilities.write_resfile(filename, residueset_nataa, residueset_allaa)

creates rosetta resfile, given residuesets with NATAA and ALAA entries

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – path for resfile

  • residueset_nataa (list of int) – residueset with NATAA entries

  • residueset_allaa (list of int) – residueset with ALLAA entries
